title: Collection Information Systems
description: A collection of systems and databases for each of the Smithsonian museums

title: Digital Asset Management System
description: Pulls assets from the CIS via the Collection DAMS Integrations System

title: Enterprise Digital Asset Network
description: Smithsonian-developed metadata index and web services middle-layer that provides the Institution with a unified view across its multiple collection repositories

title: The Museum System
description: A key system used by the Digitization Teams and Curators to catalogue, manage rights, and store data related to the museums' collection objects

title: Technical Review Board
description: A Smithsonian board that reviews content before pushing it to their website
